definition_html:
adj. smooth; tender; not harsh; not rough. [na + kakkasa]

grammarexampledeclensioncompound familyfrequencyfeedback
Pāḷiakakkasa
Grammaradj, from na kakkasa, neg
Meaningsmooth; tender; not harsh; not rough
Constructionna > a + kakkasa
Compoundkammadhāraya (na + kakkasa)
Antonymkakkasa
NotesPED suggests ku + √kar + ta
Sanskritakarkaśa

Did you spot a mistake? Correct it here.

akakkasaṃ viññāpaniṃ,
giraṃ saccam'udīraye,
yāya n'ābhisaje kañci,
tam'ahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.

DHP 408 brāhmaṇavaggo

definition_html:
adj. free from doubt; rid of doubt. [na + √kaṅkh + a]

grammarexampledeclensionroot familyfrequencyfeedback
Pāḷiakaṅkha
Grammaradj, from na kaṅkhati, neg
Meaningfree from doubt; rid of doubt
Root√kaṅkh･1 a (doubt)
Constructionna > a + √kaṅkh + a
Derivativekita (a)
Compoundkammadhāraya (na + kaṅkha)
Antonymkaṅkha
Commentary(SNPa) taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya pañcannaṃ cetokhilānañ'ca aṭṭhaṭṭhānāya kaṅkhāya ca abhāvā anejo akhilo akaṅkho
Notessee akaṅkha 2
Sanskritna + kāṅkṣā (desire)
Sanskrit Root√śaṅk 1 (doubt)

Did you spot a mistake? Correct it here.

yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagum'ābhijaññā,
akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ,
addhā hi so ogham'imaṃ atāri,
tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho.

SNP 59 mettagū māṇava pucchā
pārāyanavaggo 4

Can you think of a better example? Add it here.

adj. having no doubt; not uncertain. [na + √kaṅkh + ā + ī]

grammarexampledeclensionroot familyfrequencyfeedback
Pāḷiakaṅkhī
Grammaradj, from na kaṅkhā, neg
Meaninghaving no doubt; not uncertain
Root√kaṅkh･1 a (doubt)
Constructionna > a + √kaṅkh + ā + ī
akaṅkhā + ī
Derivativetaddhita (ī)
Compoundkammadhāraya (na + kaṅkhī)
Antonymkaṅkhī
Sanskritna + kāṅkṣin
Sanskrit Root√śaṅk 1 (doubt)

Did you spot a mistake? Correct it here.

puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idh'ekacco akaṅkhī hoti avicikicchī niṭṭhaṅ'gato saddhamme. tam'enaṃ aññataro gāḷho rog'ātaṅko phusati. tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rog'ātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṃ hoti, akaṅkhī vat'amhi avicikicchī niṭṭhaṅ'gato saddhamme'ti.

AN 4.184 abhayasuttaṃ
